data: The @sveltejs/kit/vite module provides Vite plugin integration for SvelteKit projects. This module exports utilities and configuration helpers for integrating Vite with SvelteKit's build system, enabling optimized development and production builds with Vite's fast module replacement and bundling capabilities.
Vite plugin module for SvelteKit that provides build system integration and configuration utilities.
Module for integrating Vite as the build tool in SvelteKit projects.
